contact.subtitle:
If you have any thoughts,
we'd love to hear from you.
contact.name: Name

userInfo.title: Tell us about yourself
userInfo.usernameRule: * Minimum 6 characters with both letters and numbers
userInfo.noteText1: We will collect your <u>basic demographics</u> and <u>interaction logs</u>.
userInfo.noteText2: All data is anonymised, securely stored until 2029, and used solely for academic research (Newcastle University Ethics Approval No. 54009/2023). Participation is voluntary – you may withdraw at any time!

select.fewTimesYear: A few times a year (1-3 times per year)

errors.failed: Failed to save user information. Please try again.
errors.connectionFailed: Backend connection failed. Check console for details.

feedback.title: Share Your Experience with Plot & Palette!
feedback.description: Thank you for exploring Plot & Palette! Your feedback will help us improve this artistic journey for future users.
feedback.intro: This short questionnaire includes 13 rating questions and 2 open-ended questions.
feedback.instruction: Please respond based on your immediate impressions.
feedback.declaration: *All data is anonymised, securely stored until 2029, and used only for academic research (Newcastle University Ethics Approval No. 54009/2023). Participation is voluntary—you may close this page at any time.
feedback.q1: 01. I thought the website was easy to use.
feedback.q2: 02. I could naviagte and interact with the website smoothly.
feedback.q3: 03. The website's visual design was aesthetically pleasing.
feedback.q4: 04. I could find the perfect palette that reasonates with me.
feedback.q5: 05. The colour extractions and emotion predictions from my captured palette were insightful.
feedback.q6: 06. The paintings recommended to me were a good match for the colour palette I captured.
feedback.q7: 07. The generated story was consistent with the emotion, paintings, and narrative style I selected.
feedback.q8: 08. Throughout the experience with Plot & Palette, it evoked a range of emotional responses for me (any emotions).
feedback.q9: 09. The experience of creating stories from colour palettes was engaging and stimulating.
feedback.q10: 10. I felt immersed in the journey through colours - emotions - arts - stories.
feedback.q11: 11. The experience with Plot & Palette offered me a meaningful and inspiring way to discover and appreciate art.
feedback.q12: 12. I would be interested in using Plot & Palette again in the future.
feedback.q13: 13. I would recommend Plot & Palette to friends who are interested in art or storytelling.
feedback.q14: 14. What did you like most about your experience with Plot & Palette?
feedback.q15: 15. What, if anything, would you suggest to improve Plot & Palette?
feedback.thankYou: Thank you for being part of us!
feedback.prolificText: Here is your Prolific completion link:

gallery.title: Paintings for you
gallery.subtitle: See the 10 paintings recommended from your captured colours
gallery.sourceNote: These paintings are sourced from the Google Arts & Culture.
gallery.hoverPrevious: Hover to see your previous selection:
gallery.step3Text2: Pick three to craft a unique story...
gallery.dragInstruction: Drag and drop paintings into the boxes
gallery.selectPerspective: Select the perspective that interests you the most
gallery.hoverCards: Hover your over the cards to see each story's style
gallery.reloadPrefix: I don't like any of these paintings. I want to
gallery.nameModalTitle: What shall we call your story's main character?
gallery.nameModalSubtitle: Pick a name (different from your username)

story.hoverPrevious: Hover to see your previous selection:

colorPalette.title: Colours extracted from your palette
colorPalette.subtitle: Based on your captured gradient
colorPalette.emotionQuestion: Which emotion best describes your palette?
colorPalette.emotionInstruction: Choose one to set your story's vibe...
colorPalette.emotionExplanationText: These predictions come from our emotion engine, a machine learning model trained on 4,779 real and synthetic paintings. The model analyzes your palette's colors and determines the intensity level (low, medium, or high) of each emotion present in your color selection.
